activities: FM Global collects, processes, and stores personal information for the following purposes: determining, evaluating, and implementing employment-related actions and obligations; designing, evaluating, and administering compensation and benefits programs, and administering other human resouces programs including education and training programs, evaluating employee performance, and maintaining business records relating to past, present, and potential employees; and facilitating business communications and compliance with contractual and legal obligations.
eucountries: France, Germany, Netherlands, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (AAA), European Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs)and Swiss Data Protection and Information Commissioner for human resources data
